lead_paragraph: The Big East is back in the Final Four, reinvented and re-establishing itself as one of the best basketball conferences in the country.

headline.print_headline: Villanova Has Re-Invented Big East Back in Final Four
headline.main: Villanova Has Re-Invented Big East Back in Final Four

snippet: The Big East is back in the Final Four, reinvented and re-establishing itself as one of the best basketball conferences in the country....
